headline: Harris and Trump Squabbled Over Debate Rules
description: Donald Trump and Kamala Harris are at odds over debate participation and rules for their upcoming debate on ABC News, with Harris pushing to keep both microphones on throughout.
newsletter_headline: Harris and Trump Squabbled Over Debate Rules
newsletter_sub_hed: Also, Russia attacked Ukraine’s energy infrastructure. Here’s the latest at the end of Monday.

headline: Russia attacked Ukraine’s energy infrastructure

headline: French officials explained the Telegram founder’s arrest
description: Pavel Durov, founder of Telegram, was arrested near Paris over the weekend as part of an investigation into criminal activity on the app and lack of law enforcement cooperation.

headline: Recycled plastic isn’t always what it sounds like
